snippet: Ai Weiwei, the artist who was accused of tax evasion, said he will begin paying back the $1.4 million he collected from thousands of supporters.
abstract: Chinese artist and dissident Ai Weiwei, who was accused of tax evasion, says he will begin paying back $1.4 million he collected from thousands of supporters to help him pay bond for his tax appeal.
lead_paragraph: Ai Weiwei, the artist who was accused of tax evasion, said he will begin paying back the $1.4 million he collected from thousands of supporters.

headline.main: Chinese Artist, Ai Weiwei, to Repay Donations
